movies.title: GoodFellas
movies.overview: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.

movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
movies.original_title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
movies.overview: While the Civil War rages between the Union and the Confederacy, three men – a quiet loner, a ruthless hit man and a Mexican bandit – comb the American Southwest in search of a strongbox containing $200,000 in stolen gold.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.original_title: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.overview: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
